name: drupal/navigation_plus
description: A unified UI for a variety of page building tools.

suggest.drupal/edit_plus: The Edit+ tool provides radical inline editing!
suggest.drupal/lb_plus: The Layout Builder+ tools are a drop in replacement for the Layout Builder UI.
suggest.enyo/dropzone: Required to use drupal/dropzonejs. DropzoneJS is an open source library that provides drag’n’drop file uploads with image previews.
